attributes.action: Say NO to another EU referendum and Scottish Independence Vote
attributes.additional_details:
EU- Great Britain thrived before the EU and we shall thrive again now that we have left. This is better for the future generations let's make Great Britain great again and unite.

Scottish Independence- The last vote cost over 2 million pound and the majority of us in Scotland voted NO, that hasn't changed and we don't want Nicola sturgeon and party wasting another 2 Million when it could be put to better use!!
attributes.background: The majority of the UK voted for to leave the EU make it stand and the majority of Scotland voted to remain in the UK make that also stand and stop Nicola Sturgeon and party's wasting millions that could be better used!!

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134345 (no to second EU referendum)

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361 (no to second referendum in Scotland)
